ygData.subject: RE: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: Why was the charm spell useless for Necro s?┬á it worked the same as the enchanters, right?┬á Necro s over the last couple months have gotten hammered big
ygData.messageBody:
Why was the charm spell useless for Necro's?∩┐╜ it worked the same as the
enchanters, right?∩┐╜ Necro's over the last couple months have gotten hammered
big time.∩┐╜ The charm and fear nerf changes nothing in non PVP∩┐╜situations
(which probably counts for 95% of the time).∩┐╜ My necro would be very happy
if his DOT's worked corectly in non PVP, or his life suck, or his Pet, or
Feign Death.∩┐╜ Be thankful.
∩┐╜
∩┐╜
Foladenn Darkinmore- Necromancer, Rodcet Nife
Denina- Enchanter, Rodcet Nife

considering our class relies on a spell like charm and necros didnt, i dont
consider us "lucky" it wasnt taken away, i consider it good that necros had
it taken away. it was a useless spell for them anyways.

At 09:30 AM 11/18/99 -1000, you wrote:
>>>>


<?fontfamily><?param Book Antiqua>The necromancers had the charm spell
completely taken away from them. Be glad that didn't happen to enchanters.
<?/fontfamily>
<?fontfamily><?param Arial><?smaller>Caelrie, enchanter on Fennin Ro
<?/smaller><?/fontfamily>
